thread.title: Xi meets Vanuatu's PM - Chinadaily.com.cn

author: 郭凯
title: Xi meets Vanuatu's PM - Chinadaily.com.cn
text: Xi meets Vanuatu's PM Share - WeChat BEIJING -- President Xi Jinping on Friday met with Prime Minister of the Republic of Vanuatu Charlot Salwai in Beijing.
